ground_truth.thought: 查询所请求的所有任务已完成。
ground_truth.name: FinishAction

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'GovernmentPortal.get_resource_tax_policy', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcements regarding resource tax reforms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Query for the latest policy'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_details', 'description': 'Details of the latest resource tax policy'}]}, {'name': 'IndustryAnalysis.impact_on_extraction', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of resource tax policies on the extraction industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policy_details', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Details of the policy to be analyzed'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'Analysis of the impact on the extraction industry'}]}, {'name': 'LocalTaxOffice.get_tax_rate', 'description': 'Get the resource tax rate for a specific region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region to query for tax rates'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'tax_rate', 'description': 'The resource tax rate for the specified region'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxBureau.guide_tax_declaration', 'description': 'Guide on how to declare resource tax through the electronic tax bureau.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'declaration_guide', 'description': 'Guide on tax declaration process'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解中国资源税的最新政策。首先，获取最新的关于资源税改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对资源开采行业的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的资源税率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行资源税的申报。
获取最新的关于资源税改革的政府公告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
GovernmentPortal.get_resource_tax_policy
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
latest_policy
{'policy_details': 'The latest policy includes adjustments to tax rates and new regulations for resource extraction.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'policy_details': 'The latest policy includes adjustments to tax rates and new regulations for resource extraction.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些政策对资源开采行业的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
IndustryAnalysis.impact_on_extraction
当前工具的参数'policy_details'的值是什么?
The latest policy includes adjustments to tax rates and new regulations for resource extraction.
{'impact_analysis': 'The new policy is expected to increase operational costs for extraction companies, leading to potential consolidation in the industry.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact_analysis': 'The new policy is expected to increase operational costs for extraction companies, leading to potential consolidation in the industry.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
查询我所在地区的资源税率
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
LocalTaxOffice.get_tax_rate
当前工具的参数'region'的值是什么?
my_region

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'tax_rate': '10%'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
了解如何通过电子税务局进行资源税的申报
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
ElectronicTaxBureau.guide_tax_declaration
{'declaration_guide': 'To declare resource tax, log into the electronic tax bureau, select the tax declaration module, fill in the required details, and submit the form.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'declaration_guide': 'To declare resource tax, log into the electronic tax bureau, select the tax declaration module, fill in the required details, and submit the form.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 提供有关如何通过电子税务局申报资源税的指导。
